MaxProgenitorsExceed Class Reference

Exception: Maximum number of halo progenitors exceeded This exception is called if a progenitor halo is added to a given halo but that halo already possesses the maximum allowed number of progenitor haloes (standard 25). This happens for memory reasons and means you have to increase the number of allowed progenitors. More...

#include <Exceptions.h>

Public Member Functions

 MaxProgenitorsExceed ()

Detailed Description

Exception: Maximum number of halo progenitors exceeded This exception is called if a progenitor halo is added to a given halo but that halo already possesses the maximum allowed number of progenitor haloes (standard 25). This happens for memory reasons and means you have to increase the number of allowed progenitors.
